Type Alias# LazyMapRandomAccessCollection

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias LazyMapRandomAccessCollection<T, E> = LazyMapCollection<T, E> where T : RandomAccessCollection
```
